entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
